name: Erotic Slot Machine
overview: By now, it is difficult to believe that you can do almost anything with a computer, but one thing it can't do it romance, but maybe that is wrong. It may not be able to rub your backs or run its fingers through your hair, but this little game might come close. Fun for individual or party play a safe method to have a laugh and let your inhibitions fall aside. Published in Edizione Logica 2000 Supplementi #01 - Logica 2000 N°12 (Dicembre 1985) - Erotic Games.
